Title: Most Likely to...
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (created by), Melissa Scrivner-Love, Denise ThÃ©, Sean Hennen (executive story editor), Nic Van Zeebroeck (story editor), Michael Sopczynski (story editor)
Actors: Jim Caviezel, Kevin Chapman, Amy Acker, Sarah Shahi
Plot: Reese and Shaw go to a H.S. reunion to shadow a prosecutor who may have been involved in a killing 20 years ago. Finch and Fusco compete with the FBI to find out why a government employee was killed. And not far behind is Vigilance.
